Shivah:

"Yes" said Shivah "That could be an idea, but we have more weapons to 
use agaisnt Infectrons, we have to use all in order to rescue 
Darkfate and destroy their base; but three underwater bots aren't 
enough to destroy a base and aren't useful  in ground... If that bots 
were anphious they could be useful in watter and ground... " Shivah 
looked to Killfest and asked him "Do you know how many factions are 
in this planet?"
